entry.title: $1950 // Clean Junior 1 Bedroom on Tree-lined Street UES - $1950
entry.content:
My husband and I have lived in this junior one bedroom apartment for seven years and truly love it - it feels like a zen oasis amidst a bustling city. We are only leaving because we have a baby on the way and need more space.

Some of our favorite aspects of the apartment are: how quiet it is, the layout of the kitchen is great and has room for a table or office area, management is super responsive to any requests needed, sizeable bedroom that could be divided into half bedroom/half living space.

Laundry is on the block (private for the tenants). This is a walk-up, 5th floor - 4 flights of stairs. The stairs are quite manageable as they wind around - you only go up about 8 steps before there's a landing and you wind around.

Trash chutes on every floor. Recycling in the lobby of the building.

Fantastic restaurants and grocery stores around and steps away from Carl Schurz Park!
